tool_description:
lits.rocks is an API for URL shortening.
Free to use, No advertising No registration.
All shortened links are available for lifetime.

Shortner up your URL's now........Because small links are cool.
name: Url-Shortner
title: Url-Shortner

api_list.name: GET ALL URLs
api_list.description:
`longUrl` =  URL provided by user
`shortIdentity` = unique id created by API
`shortUrl` = URL created by server
( `_id `, ` date` and `_v` are fields generated by server)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortner10.p.rapidapi.com/lits.rocks/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortner10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortner10.p.rapidapi.com/lits.rocks/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortner10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
